title: Why did Ibn Arabi help Ertugrul Ghazi? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because Ibn Arabi knew that Ertugrul Ghazi needs help and we all know that which kind of person Ibn Arabi is , Even when Claudius (Claudius was a salebi who had tried to kill Ibn Arabi ) was in need of help Ibn Arabi helped him. Good morning/ Good afternoon/ Good Night Depends on the time you are reading my answer.

Sufis are a curious lot. The reason i think ibn arabi helped ertugrul ghazi is he saw people's welfare in the capable hands of ertugrul. He saw ertugrul as a leader who can defend the people against the enemies and provide stability to the region.
